name: Instituto Atlantico
description: Instituto Atlântico is a non-profit civil society, with the major objective of providing society with scientific and technologic solutions. It acts in the Telecommunications and Information Technology areas, aiming at the development, progress, and well-being of the Brazilian society. With a team composed mainly of local professionals with high academic qualifications, Atlântico fulfills its commitment to being an active part in the development of the State.

locations.address: Rua Amador Bueno, 328 5º andar - Edifício River Tower
